State of Kentucky
Caldwell County Sct

The affiant B. J. Grubbs States that he is a Constable of Caldwell County & that he is intimitately and well acquainted with Charles Hooper who is indicted in the Caldwell Circuit Court and that he has known him from his youth to be a good and peacable young man and that his Parents are very honest honest & Respectable Citizens of Caldwell County,
Sworn to before me by B. J. Grubbs this 27" day of Feby 1865,,
